document_name: Resolution no. 87/2014 (creating the Steering Committee of the project 'Strengthening Capacity of Adaptation and Resilience to Climate Change in the Water Sector in Cape Verde')
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CPV/2014/CPV-2014-10-22-Resolution no. 87_2014 (creating the Steering Committee of the project 'Strengthening Capacity of Adaptation and Resilience to Climate Change in the Water Sector in Cape Verde')_ff863303fbe9b80f826ea691de083725.pdf
document_description: This resolution creates the Steering Committee of the project 'Strengthening Capacity of Adaptation and Resilience to Climate Change in the Water Sector in Cape Verde'. The document lists the Committee's members, competencies and functioning.
